name: Declaration of policy
text:
[PART II.]  UNCLAIMED PROPERTY HELD BY THE UNITED STATES
 
     [§523A-51]  Declaration of policy.  It is the policy of this State to discover property in the custody of officers, departments, and agencies of the United States, which property is unclaimed or abandoned by owners whose addresses are known or presumed to be in this State. [L 1988, c 93, pt of §2]
